article.title: Quaterion Solutions Awarded Cyber Security Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Quanterion Solutions Incorporated, Utica, New York, is being awarded a $26,978,011 cost-plus-fixed-fee, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract to provide research and development and non-personal services to include information collection, processing management, analysis, dissemination, and other associated activities necessary in maintaining and operating the Cyber Security Information Analysis Center's scientific and technical information repository. The location of the performance is State University of New York Institute of Technology, Utica. Electronic Systems Group, Offutt Air Force Base, Nebraska, is the contracting activity.
